member.name: X509Certificate
member.summary: The X509Certificate structure represents an X.509 certificate.

member.name: X509Certificate.SerialNumber
member.summary: The serial number of the certificate.

member.name: X509Certificate.SignatureAlgorithm
member.summary: The ID of the algorithm used to create the digital signature for the certificate.

member.name: X509Certificate.ValidFrom
member.summary: The beginning of the period of validity for the certificate.

member.name: X509Certificate.ValidUntil
member.summary: The end of the period of validity for the certificate.

member.name: X509Certificate.pszIssuer
member.summary: A pointer to a string that specifies the issuer of the certificate.

member.name: X509Certificate.pszSubject
member.summary: A pointer to a string that specifies the subject of the certificate.

member.name: X509Certificate.pPublicKey
member.summary: A pointer to the public key used to create the signature for the certificate.
